notes: On 17 October 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, police officers of the Secretary of Citizen Security clashed with an armed suspect, following a citizen's request assistance regarding a theft. The armed individual was arrested and linked to the killing of an Argentinian citizens days earlier (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 30 October 2025, in Akumal, Quintana Roo, an armed man shot and killed a person inside a supermarket on Gonzalo Guerrero Avenue. The perpetrator fled in a car with an accomplice. The perpetrators who were also involved in another attack that happened on 8 November in Tulum (coded separately) were arrested on 11 November with drugs. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2025, in Huejotzingo, Puebla, according to security cameras footage, municipal police officers arrested two Colombian men under unknown circumstances, who went missing. According to one of the victims' wife, the men were not taken to police facilities and the authorities had not reported their whereabouts.
On 30 October 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, two individuals shot and killed a man in a house used as a drug selling point on Vergel street, in colonia La Cholla. 1 fatality.

source: Quadratin Oaxaca; Yucatan a la Mano
notes: Around 8 November 2025 (between 8 - 9 November), in Tulum, Quintana Roo, two men shot and killed a boy who belonged to a rival gang on Gonzalo Guerrero avenue. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 2 November 2025, in Oaxaca de Juarez, Oaxaca, two men and a woman who belonged to Los Charangas Gang tried to stab and shot a man and a woman in the intersection of Independencia avenue and Manuel Garcia Vigil street. The victims dodged the knife attack and the firearm jammed, so the attackers beat and injured them. The perpetrators stole their belongings before fleeing. 2 injured.
